SELECT DISTINCT C.grade grade , D.semester semester , C.avg_score avgScore, C.rating avgRating FROM student A INNER JOIN lecture_student B ON A.student_num = B.student_num INNER JOIN student_semester_score C ON B.student_num = C.student_num INNER JOIN semester D ON C.isemester = D.isemester
and A.student_num = #{studentNum}

SELECT A.pic pic, A.nm name, A.gender , A.birthdate, A.phone , A.address address , A.student_num studentNum, B.major_name majorName , A.created_at createdAt, A.email, sum(C.score) scoreStudent, B.graduation_score graduationScore , A.grade grade, C.isemester isemester, D.ilecture ilecture , C.avg_score avgScore, avg(C.rating) rating FROM student A INNER JOIN major B ON A.imajor = B.imajor INNER JOIN student_semester_score C ON A.student_num = C.student_num INNER JOIN lecture_student D ON A.student_num = D.student_num WHERE A.student_num = #{studentNum};
